TopicTitle: What are the minimal times to reach the planets in the Kerbol system from Kerbin?

Articles.Content: It doesn't expect an exact number but I would really love to have a ballpark number for each of the planets if possible. Thanks!
Well, if you have enough dV, you could (in theory) get anywhere in a couple of days.

Somewhat sensible times from the launch window planner.

Travel time in days:

Moho: 15

Eve: 21

Duna: 38

Dres: 75

Jool: 140

Eeloo: 198

I don't think Duna is just 38 days. From the three missions I launched to Duna, I would say the average trip to Duna takes about 60 to 70 days. Of course, if you don't mind spending a few km/s more delta-v, you could possibly get there in much less.
